backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for users, memberships, publishing works, releases, recording projects, and artist development, including status enums and data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies feature evidence for the Rollout 21.7 deployment, including related files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions of various frontend files focused on upgrade-safe linking, array normalization, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with custom light/dark theme variables for layout and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root element and main frontend script.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_EXECUTION_LOG.md: Template log for recording execution evidence of Rollout 21.7 build, verification, and canister upgrade.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Documents completed and remaining rollout steps, including Step 9 verification and upcoming rollout readiness tasks.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_1_21_2.md: Smoke test checklist for validating frontend stability and route functionality after the 21.1–21.2 upgrade.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_3_21_4.md: Smoke test checklist for validating upgrade resilience and Edit Links functionality for the 21.3–21.4 rollout.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_5_21_6.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.5–21.6 verifying portal page loads and Edit Links dialogs for admin and non-admin users.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7_SESSION_LOG.md: Session log template for documenting rollout 21.7 smoke test execution, including principals, entity IDs, and errors.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md: Expanded smoke test for rollout 21.7 covering both roles, AuthGate/ApprovalGate, and detail-route validation with recorded entity IDs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's TanStack router, defining root, landing, and portal routes with authentication and error boundaries. Wraps portal content in auth and approval gates and sets up route-linked pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Checks user approval status and blocks access until approved, allowing admins to bypass. Displays a request-approval UI when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Ensures the user is authenticated before accessing protected content, redirecting unauthenticated users to the home page. Shows a sign‑in prompt when not logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout. Handles login edge cases like already-authenticated errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile and saves profile data via a mutation. Only appears when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access denied message with guidance for users lacking permission. Used for authorization failures.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Presents an empty-state UI with optional icon, description, and action button. Useful for cases where no data is available.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Shows an error alert and converts certain backend errors into more user-friendly messages. Intended for inline error display.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Renders a full‑screen loading skeleton used during data fetching or initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the top navigation header with the brand logo and optional authentication button. Navigates to the home page when clicked.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Provides the authenticated portal layout with header, sidebar navigation, and responsive mobile menu. Generates nav items based on user admin status and wraps page content.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: A simple button component for triggering link-editing actions, using an icon and optional disabled state.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Dialog component for editing related entity IDs with loading, error, and multi-select lists for different entity types.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Filterable checkbox list for selecting multiple entity IDs with search and scroll support.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Utility permission checks determining whether a user can edit specific records based on identity or admin status.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays linked entity records with label resolution and conditional rendering based on user role.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor bound to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's role and approval status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Hook that loads linkable entity lists for admins or callers and formats them into option objects with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, approvals, and various entity types via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles and a warm-toned light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, the query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero content, service descriptions, and Internet Identity sign-in redirect.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Guide page explaining how to bootstrap the first admin using a secret token and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Admin dashboard showing entity counts, recent items, and requiring admin access with loading and permission handling.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Admin-only interface for viewing users and assigning roles, with loading states and role update handling.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays and edits a single artist development entry, including related links and permissions-based editing.
Lists all artist development entries and allows admins to create new entries via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Shows detailed release information with editable linked entities, respecting permission rules.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Displays all releases and provides an admin-controlled form for creating new release records.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Displays and edits a single membership profile, including status, contact info, and related linked entities. Handles update mutations, link management, and permission-based editing.
Lists all membership profiles with status badges and allows admins to create new memberships. Provides a creation dialog and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Shows detailed information for a publishing work, including contributors, splits, notes, and linked entities. Supports editing notes and managing entity links with permission checks.
Displays a catalog of publishing works and allows admins to create new works with contributors and ownership splits. Includes validation logic and a creation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Shows recording project details, status, participants, and all linked entities. Supports editing related links based on user permissions.
Displays recording projects, handles loading, and provides an admin-only dialog to create new projects with form inputs.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Provides helpers to normalize unsafe array values and safely check array length or non-empty status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split arrays by checking total percentage constraints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RE: Results template for recording QA outcomes of upgrade-safe linking tests across multiple rollout cycles.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist for verifying upgrade-safe Edit Links behavior across all entity detail pages for admin and non-admin users.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema version, rollout notes, known issues, and implemented features.
